title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change as expected.
OB: After editing a label's font size to 18 points, the label's height remains unchanged.
EB: Expected behavior: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height should adjust accordingly to accommodate the new font size, maintaining proper text alignment and spacing.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label or select an existing one.
2. Edit the label's font size and set it to '18 points'.
